sessions.title: Talking about Angular 2 #12

speakers.description: Igor is a lead on the Angular project, practitioner of test driven development, open source enthusiast and hacker. In his free time, Igor enjoys spending time with his wife and two kids, doing outdoor activities.
speakers.name: Minar

speakers.description: Pascal is a front-end engineer and an Angular Developer Expert nominated by Google. He created the angular-translate module, is an Angular 2 contributor and also part of the Angular 2 Docs Authoring team.
speakers.name: Precht

speakers.description: JavaScript, Angular, React, conference speaker. Developer Expert at Google, open source lover.
speakers.name: Motto
speakers.role: Developer Advocate @Telerik. Founder of Voux, Google Developer Expert

speakers.description: Minko runs training courses in JavaScript and Angular. He has developed numerous projects such as AngularJS 1.x and Angular 2 style guides, angular2-seed, codelyzer, aspect.js, angular-aop, and many others.
speakers.name: Gechev
speakers.role: Web hacker. Author of 'Switching to Angular 2'

speakers.description: Gerard is a Computer Science Engineer & Google Developer Expert. As an Angular fanboy and community activist he is fighting for the JavaScript revolution. Having lived and worked for all sorts of companies over the whole world, he is always up for a good challenge. He likes running AngularZone London, mentoring students & participating in the community.
speakers.name: Sans

speakers.description: Tero Parviainen is an independent software developer, writer of programming books and articles, and an Angular 2 docs contributor.
speakers.name: Parviainen

speakers.description: Pawel is a software-development addict who believes in free, open source software. He is a core contributor to the Angular framework, AngularUI, Karma-runner and several other projects. Currently obsessed with making Angular 2 the best web development platform ever. When not coding, Pawel can be spotted speaking at various software development conferences.
speakers.name: Kozlowski
speakers.role: Messing with the web @AmadeusITGroup. Angular team member.

speakers.description: Trainer and Consultant with focus on Angular. Writes for O'Reilly, Hanser, windows.developer and Heise Developer. Regularly speaks at conferences.
speakers.name: Steyer
speakers.role: Freelance trainer and consultant. Focus on modern Web & service architectures.

speakers.description: Nick is a technical evangelist at Microsoft Belux where he’s helping developers, startups and software companies realize their software dreams on the Microsoft platform. You can find him speaking about cloud, mobile, web and game development at conferences or meetups.
speakers.name: Trogh

speakers.description: Philippe De Ryck is a professional speaker and trainer on software security and web security. Since he obtained his PhD at the imec-DistriNet research group (KU Leuven, Belgium), he has been running the group's Web Security Training program, which ensures a sustainable knowledge transfer of the group’s security expertise towards practitioners.
speakers.name: De Ryck
